name: Lead DevOps engineer (to Serbia / Cyprus)
description:
Company Profile:

Perfect Art Group is the international company providing premium IT consulting services to clients across the globe with focus on high performance / low latency data, analytics and advanced data visualization, IoT solutions and Data Science Platforms for Oil&Gas, Finance, Logistics and Healthcare industries

We use technology to create superior user experience and deliver innovative solutions, we simplify and accelerate decision making processes at operational and executive level by building data-enabled solutions.

With Development offices in Belgrade (Serbia) and Limassol (Cyprus), representative offices in London, Zug, Hong Kong and San Diego we build expert teams to ensure highest quality development processes, modern SDLC quality standard and cutting edge products for our clients.

Responsibilities:

  • Configuring the CI / CD pipeline: Scripting and writing and configuring tasks for automatic deployment across multiple environments, on-premises and in the cloud.
  • Troubleshooting problems at different technological levels in Linux environment: networks, databases, OS, web servers
  • Configuring Containers in a Cloud / OnPremise environment, including knowledge in Docker, Kubernetes
  • Proposal and implementation of improvements to improve system performance, availability and resiliency
  • Performing general system maintenance tasks, designing and maintaining a network of projects, computing environment and telecommunications.
  • Managing a team of devops engineers

Requirements:

  • Virtualization and Containers with a modern set of DevOps automation tools
  • Experience in installing, tuning and optimizing performance in Linux operating systems
  • Good understanding of networking and load balancing concepts
  • Understanding version control systems such as GitHub or SVN, including feature branches, code committing, fetching, submitting Knowledge of DNS, domain registration and hosting
  • Experience with openSSL, openSSH and certificate generation


Technological stack:

  • Containers: Docker (Swarm), RedHat Openshift, Kubernetes, ECS
  • VCS: Git, CodeCommit, BitBucket
  • CI: Jenkins, Teamcity
  • DB: Oracle, MS SQL, PostgreSQL

We offer:

  • Competitive salary
  • Medical Insurance for all employees
  • Employmet according to the Labor law
  • Flexible working hours
  • Up-to-date technology stack and modern software development methods
  • Working closely with experts around the world
